description:
The 24 pull-requests hackathon is a tech-agnostic hacknight/social.

24 pull requests is all about giving back to open source for Christmas.

We normally have a social in December but this time we're combining the two, come along put in a pull-request or two, chat and enjoy some nice food and beers courtesy of our sponsors :)

location.address: Prudential Buildings, 11-19 Wine St., Bristol, BS1 2PH
location.name: MixRadio

title: 24 pull requests hack-a-thon
